-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                              General Information
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type.................: Game		|
Platform.............: Windows   	|
Crack................: Included	- MPQ	|
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                                 Release Notes
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Diablo is a dark fantasy-themed action role-playing game developed by Blizzard North and released by Blizzard Entertainment on January 2, 1997.

Set in the fictional Kingdom of Khanduras (located in the Diablo series fantasy world of Sanctuary), Diablo has the player take control of a lone hero as he or she battles to rid the world of the eponymous Lord of Terror. Beneath the town of Tristram, the player journeys through sixteen dungeon levels to ultimately come face to face with Diablo and his demon minions.

Diablo was a best-seller and following the first game's popularity an expansion pack, entitled Diablo: Hellfire, was released in 1997, although it was not created by Blizzard Entertainment (Sierra).

This release is a pre-cracked portable copy of Diablo I and its expansion, HellFire. HellFire has been cracked to include a multiplayer client and additional characters (Monk, Barbarian, and Bard). This release contains all the audio and video files from the old releases (thereby explaining the size) and only files which contributed nothing to gameplay have been removed. This game is not multi-language and is only available in English.

This release will allow up to eighteen users to play cooperativly through the Diablo campaign using the Internet, a LAN, or a direct connection.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Please Note The Following:

Props to the scene.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                                 Install Notes
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Steps:

(1.) Extract the "Diablo - Ultimate.rar" file to a directory of your choice and then Navigate to the extracted directory (by default "Diablo" directory. Double-click on the "Diablo_Mod-Crack_ZKZ.exe" program. This program is not necessary as it only installs shortcuts (makes no changes to the game files which are already updated, modded, and cracked).
(2.) Click through the installation instructions. Make certain that you install 
the Mod-Crack to the "Diablo" directory.
(3.) Open the desired shortcut (which by default is) located on your desktop to 
start the game. Create a server on the desired campaign map or alternatively  
join a game already in progress.

Shortcut Information:

"Diable"                          - Multiplayer/Single player Diablo
"HellFire"                  	  - Multiplayer/Single player HellFire

Note: The official manual is included in the "X:DiabloManual" directory.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                                  In The Pipeline
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
T-BOX - ZKZ of the Federation Team

Games - Pending
EMUs  - Complete
NFO   - Pending
Test  - Complete

This release is imminent. This project seeks to combine a Lite (less than 700m)
Vista build, bootscreen, frontend, registry tweaks, several related 
applications, twenty-plus emulators and tens of thousands of various game 
images and roms in an orderly package. This package would then allow a user 
to easily create a SF personal computer (or any other light PC) that would 
act as any console from the first to sixth generation. This has been a huge
undertaking but if it is successful this project will provide the PC scene with 
the first real replacement for consoles. Please understand that projects like this one can have unsuspected kinks. Please be patient.

Half Life Decay Co-op - The Decay Team

Game  - Pending
Crack - Pending
NFO   - Pending
Mod   - Pending
Test  - Pending

We are currently waiting for the Decay Team to release their Beta port (long 
overdue). Once they do, the game will be cracked (if necessary) and released A.S.A.P.

Half Life 2 Co-op - Synergy UPDATE*

Game  - Complete
Crack - Complete
NFO   - Pending
Mod   - Pending
Test  - Pending

This release is imminent. It will possess an independent emulator rather than PAC-STEAM and as such will not need frequent updates. It will also be cleaner with a faster frame rate and most importantly a complete Half-Life 2 campaign and a (partially complete) Half-Life 2 Episode One campaign. Please understand that projects like this one can have unsuspected kinks. Please be patient. 

FarCry Co-op - BHD UPDATE*

Game  - Complete
Crack - Complete
NFO   - Pending
Mod   - Complete
Test  - Complete - Loads of Fun

This update will include the Black Hawk Down Assault Co-op mini mod made for FarCry. It will be released when time can be found for basic testing and the writing of a noob-friendly NFO.

Quake 4 Ultimate Co-op - Opencoop

Game  - Pending
Crack - Pending
NFO   - Pending
Mod   - Pending
Test  - Pending

As many of you know opencoop recently released a tech demo of their next project Quake 4 Co-op which allows you to traverse most of the levels, with large amounts of lag, glitches, and crashes. Once they have a clean version working, this Crack-Mod will be released. Because we are waiting for them to finish their work there is no release date.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
			    Scene Requests/Information
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Need - To the many individuals who already have questioned the need for a new Diablo release, the Federation offers this rebuttal. This project began when one of our members was unable to locate a Portable copy of Diablo or Hellfire (in Wnglish with the HellFire multiplayer crack). This was shocking as the Federation concentrates primarily on Co-op games and Diablo was a founding title that all our members played at one point or another. Therefore we undertook the task of creating this release. It is retro, but it is also shockingly streamlined and well developed. In short this release fulfills our requirements as it creates accessibility. If you think it still serves no purpose don't download it.

                                  Known Problems
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
(1.) Battle.net -  Battle.net doesn?t work for Diablo or its HellFire expansion and never will (not the purpose of this release). The user can still play online through a direct internet connection. If Battle.net is a necessity the Federation recommends and emulator likes PvPGN.
